deskripsi: The Zombie Apocalypse Add-On unleashes a heart-pounding survival challenge, testing your skills against relentless zombie hordes. Can you survive the night?

Siap, berangkat, lepas landas! Selamat datang, pilot! Bersiaplah menjelajah dari atas! Terbangkan 10 helikopter unik melintasi kota... dan pastikan untuk mengunjungi tiga rumah besar! Setelah mendarat, bepergianlah dengan mudah menggunakan salah satu dari enam kendaraan yang disertakan!

Discover the amazing world of Axolotl Pets! Play with axolotls, train them to fight into battles and explore unique regions. Complete minigames and quests to unlock secrets and hidden treasures. But be aware of the epic boss!
Paket Animasi yang Tidak Anda Sadari Anda Butuhkan: Hidupkan dunia Anda dengan animasi, partikel, tekstur baru, dan banyak lagi!
Paket UI Déesse adalah paket sumber daya UI yang menambahkan fitur baru, penyesuaian, dan desain UI untuk membuat permainan Minecraft Anda lebih baik!

Takut badut? Masuki Sirkus Horor! Ubah duniamu menjadi atmosfer teror sejati, di mana kabut mengerikan menyelimuti segalanya di malam hari! Berhadapan dengan badut-badut aneh ini akan menjadi mimpi terburukmu.
Upgrade your productivity with Robots! Create automated farms and mines. Battle your robots with your friends. Keep yourself safe from monsters with turrets and bodyguards.

Are you brave enough to explore the world after dark? With this add-on, strange new mobs creep out after dark. They are faster, stronger, and scarier than normal, with twisted looks and wild powers. Some are cursed versions of creatures you know, while others are brand new. Can you survive the night?
The SCPs have become UNCAGED across your world, and it is up to you to contain them!

This super Aesthetic Add-On brings hundreds of unique and stylish pieces of furniture to any and every world! No longer will you have to pretend that a stair block is a chair, or a pressure plate a table!
